Articles.Content:
I'm currently looking at an SSTO (single Rapier, delta wings, 4 radial intakes, simple enough thing) that has an apoapsis of 95,339 km and periapsis of 72,746 km according to MechJeb (really, it's 95 by 72 km, since I'm sitting at apoapsis paused with a readout of 95339m on the altimeter), currently moving at 2235.0 m/s, but science experiments show me as still being at the runway, and I can't switch/leave craft due to the game saying I'm moving over the surface...

Oops, went EVA and returned to cockpit and it seems to have fixed itself (except for Mechjeb saying km instead of m, but that's not a huge deal).

Edited September 16, 2014 by Kryxal
